name: Night Crawler
description:
Welcome to your worst nightmare.... Or sweetest dream?

Night Crawler is a horror visual novel hugely inspired by Bileshroom and Mortisfox and their games.

Trigger warning for sexual content and gore in future updates!

In this version, you are a male!!

Female and non-affirming options will be available at full release!

This is only a demo I made in about 31-33 hours.  

Feedback is welcome!!
